explains: n. 无名，默默无闻；费解，晦涩；<文>昏暗，黑暗

sentences.en: He spent most of his life working in obscurity.
sentences.cn: 他在默默无闻的工作中度过了大半生。

sentences.en: She was plucked from obscurity to instant stardom.
sentences.cn: 她从默默无闻中得到提携，转瞬成为明星。

sentences.en: For the lucky few, there's the chance of being plucked from obscurity and thrown into the glamorous world of modelling.
sentences.cn: 极少数幸运者有机会从默默无闻中脱颖而出，跻身多彩的模特儿世界。
